sentences.en: A document defining acceptable access to protected , DMZ, and unprotected networks.
sentences.cn: 策略,用来定义能够对保护网络, DMZ和非保护网络访问的文本.

sentences.en: An unprotected childhood in a cold world has beaten gentleness out of me.
sentences.cn: 在世态炎凉中度过的无人庇护的童年已经把温柔从我的身上赶走了.

sentences.en: At the same time, you better not leave your transports unprotected.
sentences.cn: 同时, 你最好不要把运输艇独自扔在海域里.

sentences.en: During the early years of FOIA, however , companies submitting proprietary information often felt unprotected.
sentences.cn: 在《信息自由法》的早期阶段,提供专有信息的公司常常感到得不到保护.

sentences.en: He let the blows rain on his unprotected head and neck until Sonny's rage ebbed.
sentences.cn: 他听任桑儿的拳头冰昏似的落在他的光脑壳上和脖子上,直到桑儿的怒气渐渐消下去.

sentences.en: High levels of unprotected sex among young people are ringing alarm bells.
sentences.cn: 年轻人之间不带保护措施的频繁性行为敲响了警钟.

sentences.en: I wanted to drive home the dangers of unprotected sex.
sentences.cn: 我想让你彻底理解无保护性行为的危害性.

sentences.en: Iron or steel parts will rust, if they are unprotected.
sentences.cn: 铁件或钢件是会生锈的, 如果不加保护的话.

sentences.en: Machinery was often unprotected and accidents were frequent.
sentences.cn: 机器常裸露着，因此事故频仍。

sentences.en: Part-time workers are unprotected by this law.
sentences.cn: 兼职职员不受这条法规保护。

sentences.en: That left the plant in a dangerously unprotected condition, a calculated risk.
sentences.cn: 这使电厂处于危险的无防卫的境地, 这是一次有意的冒险.

sentences.en: The majority of them result from unprotected skin exposure to UV radiation.
sentences.cn: 它们中的大部分都发生于暴露于紫外线的未加保护的皮肤.

sentences.en: There were wrists, unprotected by coat or pocket, which were red with cold.
sentences.cn: 那些露在上衣或衣袋外面的手腕都冻得发红.

sentences.en: They can either produce a few well - protected offspring or a unprotected ones.
sentences.cn: 他们要么生出少数几个保护得很好的孩子,要么产出亿万个未保护的孩子.
窃贼常常瞄准未采取防护措施的车辆。

sentences.en: This leaves fertile soil unprotected and prone to erosion.
sentences.cn: 这会让肥沃的土壤暴露在外，使其容易受到侵蚀。

sentences.en: You are playing Russian roulette every time you have unprotected sex.
sentences.cn: 行房时不采取避孕措施是非常危险的。

words.tran_cn: 无保护的；未设防的；不受关税保护的

trans.tran_cn: 无保护（者）的，无防卫的，不受关税保护的
trans.tran_en: not protected against possible harm or damage
